channel.title: Kubernetes on Sandesh Solabannavar
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Sandesh Solabannavar

item.title: Digital Fulfillment Service
item.description: Digital Fulfillment Service is an application which is used to fulfill the Digital purchase done and assign the appropriate grants to the user.

item.title: Course Manager
item.description: Course manager is a micro service used by multiple BUs in their application where the students can view, take or review the courses they are enrolled.

item.title: Certificate Service
item.description: Certificate Service is an applicating which is used to award the students with the Certificate once the course is completed.
